ThirdParty Folder Structure

The ThirdParty folder is for external assets, libraries, or tools that are not native to Unity but are integrated into the project.
Folder Descriptions

    /ArtAssets: Contains third-party art assets, such as textures or models, used within the game.
    /Shaders: Stores shaders developed by external creators that are used to enhance the visual quality of the game.
    /Code: Includes third-party scripts or libraries that provide additional functionality or support specific features.
    /Textures: Houses third-party textures used across various assets in the project.
    /Audio: Contains third-party audio files, including music, sound effects, and voiceover assets.

Examples

    /Code: You might find a pathfinding library here, providing advanced AI navigation capabilities that are integrated into the project.
